name: The Princess and the Rose Knight
summary:
Short yuri-themed RPG Maker game created by rpgex/En. The player controls Galatea, commander of the newly established princess guard,on her adventures trying to protect the adventure-loving princess of Laomedia. The player must explore various dungeons and partake in turn-based combat to defeat enemies.

While the in-dungeon gameplay is fairly similar to most traditional console RPGs (although, the game does feature a SaGa-inspired glimmer system for unlocking new abilities mid-combat), while in the castle, the player can also interact with a variety of characters and flirt with all the cute girls around! The game keeps track of how "yuri" the player's responses to the different characters are via a yuri gauge, a fun play on the typical alignment gauge found in other RPGs.
